title: Casa Verde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A sign out front reads "vegan food." Many vegetarian items and a few vegan ones on the menu are marked. Dinner courses with veg options. Menu states that food is cooked in vegetable oil. On the a la carte menu: licuados, juices, smoothies, salads, pizzas, crepes, soups, baguette sandwiches, and falafel with salad. Previously located at 15 Av 2-38, June 2015. Directions: Located just above the post office, at the front of Vrisa book shop.
